00019 #ifndef __BUFFERS_H__

00032 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00033 
00034 class Device;
00035 struct float4;
00036 
00037 /* Buffer Parameters
00038    Size of render buffer and how it fits in the full image (border render). */
00039 
00040 class BufferParams {
00041 public:
00042     /* width/height of the physical buffer */
00043     int width;
00044     int height;
00045 
00046     /* offset into and width/height of the full buffer */
00047     int full_x;
00048     int full_y;
00049     int full_width;
00050     int full_height;
00051 
00052     /* passes */
00053     vector<Pass> passes;
00054 
00055     /* functions */
00056     BufferParams();
00057 
00058     void get_offset_stride(int& offset, int& stride);
00059     bool modified(const BufferParams& params);
00060     void add_pass(PassType type);
00061     int get_passes_size();
00062 };
00063 
00064 /* Render Buffers */
00065 
00066 class RenderBuffers {
00067 public:
00068     /* buffer parameters */
00069     BufferParams params;
00070     /* float buffer */
00071     device_vector<float> buffer;
00072     /* random number generator state */
00073     device_vector<uint> rng_state;
00074     /* mutex, must be locked manually by callers */
00075     thread_mutex mutex;
00076 
00077     RenderBuffers(Device *device);
00078     ~RenderBuffers();
00079 
00080     void reset(Device *device, BufferParams& params);
00081 
00082     bool copy_from_device();
00083     bool get_pass(PassType type, float exposure, int sample, int components, float *pixels);
00084 
00085 protected:
00086     void device_free();
00087 
00088     Device *device;
00089 };
00090 
00091 /* Display Buffer
00092  *
00093  * The buffer used for drawing during render, filled by tonemapping the render
00094  * buffers and converting to uchar4 storage. */
00095 
00096 class DisplayBuffer {
00097 public:
00098     /* buffer parameters */
00099     BufferParams params;
00100     /* dimensions for how much of the buffer is actually ready for display.
00101        with progressive render we can be using only a subset of the buffer.
00102        if these are zero, it means nothing can be drawn yet */
00103     int draw_width, draw_height;
00104     /* draw alpha channel? */
00105     bool transparent;
00106     /* byte buffer for tonemapped result */
00107     device_vector<uchar4> rgba;
00108     /* mutex, must be locked manually by callers */
00109     thread_mutex mutex;
00110 
00111     DisplayBuffer(Device *device);
00112     ~DisplayBuffer();
00113 
00114     void reset(Device *device, BufferParams& params);
00115     void write(Device *device, const string& filename);
00116 
00117     void draw_set(int width, int height);
00118     void draw(Device *device);
00119     bool draw_ready();
00120 
00121 protected:
00122     void device_free();
00123 
00124     Device *device;
00125 };
00126
